sentences.english: I am here.
sentences.indonesian: Saya di sini.

sentences.english: That is for you.
sentences.indonesian: Itu untuk kamu.

sentences.english: My friend is at home.
sentences.indonesian: Teman saya ada di rumah.

sentences.english: She is not here today.
sentences.indonesian: Dia tidak di sini hari ini.

sentences.english: Why don't you come with me?
sentences.indonesian: Kenapa kamu tidak ikut dengan saya?

sentences.english: I need to talk to her.
sentences.indonesian: Saya perlu bicara dengan dia.

sentences.english: The book is on the table.
sentences.indonesian: Bukunya ada di atas meja.

sentences.english: I was a happy child.
sentences.indonesian: Saya dulu anak yang bahagia.

sentences.english: Where are the keys?
sentences.indonesian: Di mana kuncinya?

sentences.english: I want a coffee, please.
sentences.indonesian: Saya mau kopi, tolong.

sentences.english: I have to go to work tomorrow.
sentences.indonesian: Saya harus pergi kerja besok.

sentences.english: She told me the truth.
sentences.indonesian: Dia bilang yang sebenarnya ke saya.

sentences.english: The children are playing in the park.
sentences.indonesian: Anak-anak sedang bermain di taman.

sentences.english: I don't know what to do.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak tahu harus bagaimana.

sentences.english: My family lives near here.
sentences.indonesian: Keluarga saya tinggal dekat sini.

sentences.english: How much does this dress cost?
sentences.indonesian: Berapa harga gaun ini?

sentences.english: I'm going to the store after lunch.
sentences.indonesian: Saya akan ke toko setelah makan siang.

sentences.english: He never arrives on time.
sentences.indonesian: Dia tidak pernah datang tepat waktu.

sentences.english: I really like music.
sentences.indonesian: Saya sangat suka musik.

sentences.english: Can you help me with this?
sentences.indonesian: Bisa tolong bantu saya dengan ini?

sentences.english: I was tired when I got home.
sentences.indonesian: Saya capek waktu sampai rumah.

sentences.english: They always eat together.
sentences.indonesian: Mereka selalu makan bersama.

sentences.english: I gave him the gift yesterday.
sentences.indonesian: Saya kasih dia hadiah kemarin.

sentences.english: It's very hot today.
sentences.indonesian: Hari ini sangat panas.

sentences.english: I don't have time for that now.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak ada waktu untuk itu sekarang.

sentences.english: My parents are coming to visit me next week.
sentences.indonesian: Orang tua saya akan datang mengunjungi saya minggu depan.

sentences.english: Have you seen my phone?
sentences.indonesian: Sudah lihat HP saya?

sentences.english: We were all waiting outside.
sentences.indonesian: Kami semua sedang menunggu di luar.

sentences.english: It's important to study every day.
sentences.indonesian: Penting untuk belajar setiap hari.

sentences.english: He asked me if I wanted to go.
sentences.indonesian: Dia tanya apakah saya mau pergi.

sentences.english: The window is open because it's hot.
sentences.indonesian: Jendelanya terbuka karena panas.

sentences.english: We're going to go out tonight.
sentences.indonesian: Kami akan keluar malam ini.

sentences.english: I asked him to help me.
sentences.indonesian: Saya minta dia untuk bantu saya.

sentences.english: There are many people downtown.
sentences.indonesian: Ada banyak orang di pusat kota.

sentences.english: I don't like it when it rains.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak suka kalau hujan.

sentences.english: She works from eight until five.
sentences.indonesian: Dia kerja dari jam delapan sampai jam lima.

sentences.english: I want to learn to play the guitar.
sentences.indonesian: Saya mau belajar main gitar.

sentences.english: Nobody knows what happened.
sentences.indonesian: Tidak ada yang tahu apa yang terjadi.

sentences.english: I called you three times yesterday.
sentences.indonesian: Saya telepon kamu tiga kali kemarin.

sentences.english: You should arrive before seven.
sentences.indonesian: Kamu harus sampai sebelum jam tujuh.

sentences.english: I would like to travel around the world.
sentences.indonesian: Saya ingin keliling dunia.

sentences.english: I always think about you.
sentences.indonesian: Saya selalu memikirkan kamu.

sentences.english: I can't find my keys anywhere.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak bisa menemukan kunci saya di mana pun.

sentences.english: The food was delicious.
sentences.indonesian: Makanannya enak sekali.

sentences.english: I hope you are well.
sentences.indonesian: Semoga kamu baik-baik saja.

sentences.english: It's been a long time since I've seen you.
sentences.indonesian: Sudah lama tidak bertemu dengan kamu.

sentences.english: My head hurts.
sentences.indonesian: Kepala saya sakit.

sentences.english: Do you know where the bathroom is?
sentences.indonesian: Tahu tidak kamar mandinya di mana?

sentences.english: I'm going to buy bread at the bakery.
sentences.indonesian: Saya akan beli roti di toko roti.

sentences.english: I haven't eaten anything all day.
sentences.indonesian: Saya belum makan apa-apa seharian.

sentences.english: She is taller than her sister.
sentences.indonesian: Dia lebih tinggi dari kakaknya.

sentences.english: I forgot to bring the money.
sentences.indonesian: Saya lupa bawa uangnya.

sentences.english: We have to finish this before Friday.
sentences.indonesian: Kita harus selesaikan ini sebelum hari Jumat.

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.indonesian: Umur kamu berapa?

sentences.english: I love your new shirt.
sentences.indonesian: Saya suka banget baju baru kamu.

sentences.english: I've been learning English for two years.
sentences.indonesian: Saya sudah belajar bahasa Inggris selama dua tahun.

sentences.english: I don't understand why he's angry.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak mengerti kenapa dia marah.

sentences.english: They should be arriving soon.
sentences.indonesian: Mereka seharusnya segera sampai.

sentences.english: The train leaves at two thirty.
sentences.indonesian: Keretanya berangkat jam dua setengah tiga.

sentences.english: Would you like something to drink?
sentences.indonesian: Mau minum sesuatu?

sentences.english: We met five years ago.
sentences.indonesian: Kami bertemu lima tahun yang lalu.

sentences.english: I prefer to stay home tonight.
sentences.indonesian: Saya lebih suka di rumah aja malam ini.

sentences.english: He left without saying anything.
sentences.indonesian: Dia pergi tanpa bilang apa-apa.

sentences.english: I still don't know the answer.
sentences.indonesian: Saya masih belum tahu jawabannya.

sentences.english: It's necessary that you come early.
sentences.indonesian: Penting supaya kamu datang lebih awal.

sentences.english: It surprised me to see him there.
sentences.indonesian: Saya kaget melihat dia di sana.

sentences.english: Have you ever been to America?
sentences.indonesian: Pernah tidak ke Amerika?

sentences.english: I promised him I would return soon.
sentences.indonesian: Saya janji sama dia akan segera kembali.

sentences.english: I'm sure you'll achieve it.
sentences.indonesian: Saya yakin kamu pasti bisa mencapainya.

sentences.english: I don't want them to worry about me.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak mau mereka khawatir tentang saya.

sentences.english: We've been living here since last year.
sentences.indonesian: Kami sudah tinggal di sini sejak tahun lalu.

sentences.english: I would like you to come with me.
sentences.indonesian: Saya mau kamu ikut dengan saya.

sentences.english: Even if it rains, we're going out.
sentences.indonesian: Walaupun hujan, kami tetap akan keluar.

sentences.english: I had already finished when you arrived.
sentences.indonesian: Saya sudah selesai waktu kamu datang.

sentences.english: The more I think about it, the less I understand it.
sentences.indonesian: Semakin saya pikirkan, semakin tidak mengerti.

hints.english: The more I think about it

sentences.english: If I had money, I would travel the world.
sentences.indonesian: Kalau saya punya uang, saya akan keliling dunia.

sentences.english: It's likely they'll arrive late.
sentences.indonesian: Kemungkinan mereka akan datang terlambat.

sentences.english: I would have done it if I had had time.
sentences.indonesian: Saya akan melakukannya kalau saya ada waktu.

sentences.english: I hope you have a good day.
sentences.indonesian: Semoga hari kamu menyenangkan.

sentences.english: It doesn't matter what others say.
sentences.indonesian: Tidak masalah apa kata orang lain.

sentences.english: It's very hard for me to get up early.
sentences.indonesian: Sangat susah bagi saya untuk bangun pagi.

sentences.english: We need to be more careful.
sentences.indonesian: Kita perlu lebih hati-hati.

sentences.english: Despite everything, we keep going forward.
sentences.indonesian: Meskipun begitu, kami terus maju.

sentences.english: Don't worry, everything will turn out fine.
sentences.indonesian: Jangan khawatir, semuanya akan baik-baik saja.

sentences.english: I'm glad you came.
sentences.indonesian: Saya senang kamu datang.

sentences.english: It's worth trying one more time.
sentences.indonesian: Layak dicoba sekali lagi.

sentences.english: I would like to ask you a favor.
sentences.indonesian: Saya ingin minta tolong.

sentences.english: No matter how much I try, I can't do it.
sentences.indonesian: Seberapapun saya mencoba, saya tidak bisa melakukannya.

hints.english: No matter how much I try

sentences.english: I'm afraid it may be too late.
sentences.indonesian: Saya takut sudah terlambat.

sentences.english: It's a shame you can't come.
sentences.indonesian: Sayang sekali kamu tidak bisa datang.

sentences.english: I can't wait for the weekend to arrive.
sentences.indonesian: Saya tidak sabar menunggu akhir pekan.

sentences.english: I realized I had made a mistake.
sentences.indonesian: Saya sadar sudah membuat kesalahan.

sentences.english: As soon as I finish, I'll call you.
sentences.indonesian: Begitu selesai, saya akan telepon kamu.

sentences.english: Had I known, I wouldn't have come.
sentences.indonesian: Kalau saya tahu, saya tidak akan datang.

sentences.english: Perhaps you should consult with an expert.
sentences.indonesian: Mungkin kamu harus konsultasi dengan ahli.

sentences.english: It's not that I don't care, it's that I'm busy.
sentences.indonesian: Bukan saya tidak peduli, tapi saya sibuk.

hints.english: It's not that I don't care

sentences.english: Whatever it costs, I'm going to achieve it.
sentences.indonesian: Apapun biayanya, saya akan mencapainya.

sentences.english: Actions speak louder than words.
sentences.indonesian: Perbuatan lebih keras daripada kata-kata.

sentences.english: Better late than never.
sentences.indonesian: Lebih baik terlambat daripada tidak sama sekali.

sentences.english: Practice makes perfect.
sentences.indonesian: Latihan membuat sempurna.
